document.comment: Generated automatically from Godot engine sources.

section.title: XRBodyTracker
section.paragraph: Experimental: This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

section.title: Description
section.paragraph: A body tracking system will create an instance of this object and add it to the XRServer. This tracking system will then obtain skeleton data, convert it to the Godot Humanoid skeleton and store this data on the XRBodyTracker object.
Use XRBodyModifier3D to animate a body mesh using body tracking data.

Represents the size of the Joint enum.
The joint's orientation data is valid.
The joint's orientation is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.
The joint's position data is valid.
The joint's position is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.

section.title: Property Descriptions
section.paragraph: The type of body tracking data captured.
If true, the body tracking data is valid.

section.title: Method Descriptions
section.paragraph: Returns flags about the validity of the tracking data for the given body joint.
Returns the transform for the given body joint.
